product_name: Freedom ThickSlick Sport Bike Tire - 700 x 25
long_description: With twice the protection of a standard rubber-casing tire, the Freedom ThickSlick Sport bike tire is designed to withstand the harshest urban elements to deter flats around town or anyhwere you ride.
short_description: With twice the protection of a standard rubber-casing tire, the Freedom ThickSlick Sport bike tire is designed to withstand the harshest urban elements to deter flats around town or anyhwere you ride.
